column5: I was thinking of testing my luck with the Brown trout on the grand river south of Belwood lake Dam tomorrow, Anyone gone up there lately how's the fishing?   Thanks
Well, they just dumped thousands of stockers into the river....you should be alright!
I was driving past the other day and seen the truck with a big tank and 5-6 guys stocking the river
I have....and their is a joke in those two words.   Art
